chara.textHome: Hi, I'm Nanoha Takamachi.

An incident happened back when I was little
and that's how I was introduced to magic.

My partner is Raising Heart,
a magic staff with a heart of her own.
We'll do our best, so leave the fighting to us!

It's so much fun, learning all kinds of
new magic and tactics!
I'll become even stronger!

Now, I can push myself even more!!!
â€•All right.

For all those I want to protect,
all those I want to help,
I promise I'll get stronger!

I received my magic and Raising Heart
from a very important friend.

I'll keep perfecting them so I can save
 people who are in trouble!

I'll become strong. Even if something seems
impossible... I'll only regret it if I take the
easy way out and give up.

I've made up my mind.
I won't give up, no matter what...
I'll protect everything my magic can reach.
Let's make today a good one!
*Yaaawn* Morning...
I had a bit of a late night last night...
All right, time to get up...
It's time for lunch! Now, what to eat?
Hi there! I'm Nanoha Takamachi.
I'm a part-time mage!
You can call me "Nanoha"!
It's early evening.
I always practice magic around this time!
Can't beat dinner after lots of hard work!
A nice bath and then it's off to bed!

Is it just me, or isn't it fun
talking this late at night?
Welcome back...

It's always important to be prepared,
but how about a relaxing chat instead
this time?
Raising Heart and I are good to go!
Ready when you are!

How about a quick sparring match?
I'd love to see how much my
recent training has paid off.
So what do you think?
If you have some time, let's talk!

I'm sure we'll be even better
friends in no time.

I use Midchildan magic.
It's rather popular in the
Time-Space Administration Bureau,

but it's really surprising how many
different types of magic there are here.

My Barrier Jacket's got the
thickest armor around!

Little attacks are nothing,
so you can count on me.

The Time-Space Administration Bureau is
like a police force that handles incidents
on a dimensional scale...

Things that would endanger places
far off in outer space. 
I'm kind of like one of their assistants.
Fate and Hayate are my treasured friends.

We only met about two years ago,
but all the words we've shared
made us so close.

I first learned about magic
when I met Raising Heart.

She's been my teacher and partner
ever since.
She's always there when I need her.

If only I'd fought harder more lives
could've been saved.

I have to get stronger, so sad stories don't
have to end that way anymore!

I'll get stronger,
because my goals haven't changed.
I can't let my friends down.
Would you help me figure out what to do?
Oh yeah, actually, I'm left-handed.

Holding chopsticks isn't a problem at all,
but writing can be a pain sometimes.

Here we go, Raising Heart!
â€•Stand by, ready.
I, Nanoha Takamachi, will never give in!
Good job! I knew you would win!
We won! Now it's time to talk.
I can't lose! I have things I need to protect...
All this power... I'll try even harder!

I've come this far with everyone's help...
I won't let them down!
Would you tell me more?

My best weapons are good
defense and firepower.
I want to become more adaptable!
